- Add 3 major NPC factions with invisible "elevator" stations.
- Players can sell resources at these stations.
- Stations consume resources and regenerate demand over time.
- Add pricing fluctuation based on faction demand (early supply/demand loop).

3 🏭 ","description":"# Economy Core & NPC Factions!

> Goal: Simulate early X-style production and start the economy loop.

✅ Deliverables:

- Add 3 major NPC factions with invisible "elevator" stations.
- Players can sell resources at these stations.
- Stations consume resources and regenerate demand over time.
- Add pricing fluctuation based on faction demand (early supply/demand loop).
